text: @realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar So called travel bans had more holes than Swiss cheese. Nothing but PR stunts with no teeth. 100s of 1000s of people poured out China and Europe. The bans were a non-existent joke.                                                  https://t.co/dstgTgiu9X
